parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among all requests. ClientToken can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not set this parameter, the system uses **RequestId** as **ClientToken**. The value of **RequestId** for each API request may be different.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**. Valid values: **1** to **50**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the IPsec-VPN connection.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent list of regions.

parameters.name: RouteEntryType
parameters.description:
The route type. Valid values:

*   **custom** (default): a destination-based route
*   **bgp**: a BGP route

parameters.name: VpnConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPsec-VPN connection.
